Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 30 minutes ago, Loren Pechtel said:
> 
> 
> What I'm saying is that if you have one of those pipes in your hand it's impossible to connect it to a vessel.  You have to put them on in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> and then a Kerbal can run the hose from one to another.
> 

Sounds like you need to read the manual. It's included in game, the PDF can be found in your <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> install, and there should be a link in the <abbr title="Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it.">OP</abbr>.

> 
> 
> 47 minutes ago, Merkov said:
> 
> 
> That's not true. Not only is it possible to connect them to vessels, that's what they are designed to do. Does your kerbal on EVA have a tool (wrench or electric screwdriver) equipped? As long as you are carrying the <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> pipe port and have a tool equipped, you should be able to attach it to any part that allows surface attaching no problem. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I don't remember for sure (since I do all my EVA work with Engineers) but I seem to recall that the electric screwdriver can only be used by Engineers, but the wrench can be used by anyone. I'm pretty sure that for a simple <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> pipe port either tool will do.
> 

I have been able to attach other parts, just not that one.

> 
> 
> On 9/27/2016 at 2:57 PM, micha said:
> 
> 
> So I updated to KSP 1.2.0.1540, made a few more fixes, and it seems to be working now. No detailed testing, but I can attach and detach batteries and the KEES PC (the bit I'm actually interested in right now).
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [https://github.com/KospY/<abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/pull/173](https://github.com/KospY/KIS/pull/173)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> If anybody else wants to test this, remember that you will also need to recompile the [KSPDev](https://github.com/ihsoft/KSPDev) plugin before compiling <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>.
> 

where can one download this test build of <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> for KSP 1.2Pre?

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, Loren Pechtel said:
> 
> 
> I have been able to attach other parts, just not that one.
> 

I attach/detach the pipe connector part all the time.  You need an Engineer who has an equipped wrench or screwdriver.  Tell us what happens when you try, and include a screenshot if you can (press F1 to create a screenshot in the Kerbal Space Program\Screenshots directory)

> 
> 
> 14 hours ago, StevieC said:
> 
> 
> where can one download this test build of <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> for KSP 1.2Pre?
> 

You can't. You have to compile it yourself until the authors make a release.

FYI. <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> v1.3.0 for KSP 1.2 is available on Curseforge and <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>. I'll start new <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> thread today night.

> 
> 
> On August 29, 2016 at 0:17 PM, jfigueredo said:
> 
> 
> I would like to make a small request, could you possibly add the option to stage\action group the K4 Standard Explosives, this would be very useful for destroying separated stages. I'm thinking a right click menu in the <abbr title="Vehicle Assembly Building">VAB</abbr> to set delay and an option to add and remove from staging like some parts have. I would do it myself but I have no idea how to add staging and action groups to parts. Love this mod, great work.
> 

Thanks Igor for all your hard work!

I was building a warehouse gantry crane last night thinking. "KSP just wouldn't be the same without <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> / <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>"

> 
> 
> 34 minutes ago, V8jester said:
> 
> 
> Thanks Igor for all your hard work!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I was building a warehouse gantry crane last night thinking. "KSP just wouldn't be the same without <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> / <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>"
> 

I honestly dont understand how, at this point, after all this time, <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> arent stock in the game.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Calvin\_Maclure said:
> 
> 
> I honestly dont understand how, at this point, after all this time, <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> arent stock in the game.
> 

Being a software engineer myself I perfectly understand why this mod is not a part of the game (and it never will). In nutshell, it's too complex to re-implement it from scratch in the game. And using third-party code in a proprietary software (the game) is always a huge problem. Not to mention, the game designers may not agree with all the <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> approaches. And, to be honest, they will have the point.

Has something changed with <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> in order to equip an engineer with the wrench or screwdriver? I can't access "inventory" for kerbals so can't figure out how to equip my kerbals.

> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, Space Cowboy Bob said:
> 
> 
> Has something changed with <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr>/<abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> in order to equip an engineer with the wrench or screwdriver? I can't access "inventory" for kerbals so can't figure out how to equip my kerbals.
> 

Have you updated to KSP 1.2 and <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> 1.3.0?

> 
> 
> 5 minutes ago, IgorZ said:
> 
> 
> Have you updated to KSP 1.2 and <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> 1.3.0?
> 

Just realized I had grabbed the wrong output from Github. Just downloaded the correct version now from Curse. Thanks.

As it was announced before, this topic moves into a new one:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/149848-12-kerbal-inventory-system-<abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">kis</abbr>-v130/](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/149848-12-kerbal-inventory-system-kis-v130/)

I'll ask moderators to close this one.
This thread is now closed, please direct any inquiries regarding <abbr title="Kerbal Inventory System (mod)">KIS</abbr> to the thread linked above, thank you.
